title: The State of Comedy on Television, Plus a ‘True Detective’ Recap | The Watch (Ep. 323)
description:
With the third episode of ‘True Detective’ there seems to be some pull between the writers and the director (6:30). The popular legal drama ‘Perry Mason’ will return as an HBO series (26:50). Showtime’s ‘Black Monday’ is playing at a higher frequency (35:36), and we share other TV comedies we’re watching (47:59).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Read Alison Herman’s review of ‘Black Monday’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
